prompts: Create a playful Pokemon that loves to scurry around in grassy fields.
Design a unique Pokemon with a zigzag pattern and a mischievous personality.
Imagine a Pokemon that blends into its forest habitat with earthy tones.
Generate a small, furry Pokemon known for its speed and agility.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a raccoon, with a knack for collecting shiny objects.
Show me a Pokemon that has a cute but mischievous expression and loves to play.
Give me a Pokemon that thrives in urban areas and is always on the lookout for food.
